text: asset_profile Information related company's location, operations, officers. calendar_events Earnings Revenue expectations upcoming earnings date. company_officers Retrieves top executives given symbol total pay package. earnings_history Data related historical earnings (actual vs. estimate) earnings Historical earnings data. earnings_trend Historical trend data earnings revenue estimations esg_scores Data related environmental, social, governance metrics financial_data Financial key performance indicators fund_bond_holdings Retrieves aggregated maturity duration information given symbol fund_bond_ratings Retrieves aggregated maturity duration information fund_equity_holdings Fund equity holdings fund_holding_info Contains information funds top holdings, bond ratings, bond holdings, equity holdings, sector weightings, category breakdown fund_ownership Top 10 owners given symbol fund_performance Historical return data given symbol specific category fund_profile Summary level information given symbol fund_section_weightings Retrieves aggregated sector weightings given symbol fund_top_holdings Retrieves Top 10 holdings given symbol fund_holdings Holding info given fund grading_history Data related upgrades / downgrades companies index_trend Trend data related given symbol's index, specificially PE PEG ratios inside_holders Data related stock holdings given symbol(s) insiders insider_transactions Transactions insiders given symbol(s) institution_ownership Top 10 owners given symbol key_stats KPIs given symbol major_holders Data showing breakdown owners given symbol(s), insiders, institutions, etc. page_views Short, Mid, Long-term trend data regarding symbol's page views price Detailed pricing data given symbol, exchange, quote type, currency, market cap, pre / post market data, etc. quote_type Stock exchange specific data given symbol recommendation_trend Data related historical recommendations (buy, hold, sell) given symbol security_filings Historical SEC filings share_purchase_activity High-level buy / sell data summary_detail Contains information available via Summary tab Yahoo Finance summary_profile Return business summary given symbol valuation_measures Retrieves valuation measures recent four quarters option_chain Option chain data expiration dates given symbol option_expiration_dates Option expiration dates option_strikes Option strikes quote Get real-time quote information given symbol recommendations Recommended symbols technical_insights Technical indicators given symbol
